012     *******************************************************************************/
013    package net.sf.oval.constraint;
014    
015    import static net.sf.oval.Validator.getCollectionFactory;
016    
017    import java.util.Map;
018    
019    import net.sf.oval.ConstraintTarget;
020    import net.sf.oval.Validator;
021    import net.sf.oval.configuration.annotation.AbstractAnnotationCheck;
022    import net.sf.oval.context.OValContext;
023    
024    /**
025     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
026     */
027    public class MinCheck extends AbstractAnnotationCheck<Min>
028    {
029            private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
030    
031            private double min;
032    
033            /**
034             * {@inheritDoc}
035             */
036            @Override
037            public void configure(final Min constraintAnnotation)
038            {
039                    super.configure(constraintAnnotation);
040                    setMin(constraintAnnotation.value());
041            }
042    
043            /**
044             * {@inheritDoc}
045             */
046            protected ConstraintTarget[] getAppliesToDefault()
047            {
048                    return new ConstraintTarget[]{ConstraintTarget.VALUES};
049            }
050            
051            /**
052             * @return the min
053             */
054            public double getMin()
055            {
056                    return min;
057            }
058    
059            /**
060             * {@inheritDoc}
061             */
062            public boolean isSatisfied(final Object validatedObject, final Object valueToValidate, final OValContext context,
063                            final Validator validator)
064            {
065                    if (valueToValidate == null) return true;
066    
067                    if (valueToValidate instanceof Number)
068                    {
069                            final double doubleValue = ((Number) valueToValidate).doubleValue();
070                            return doubleValue >= min;
071                    }
072    
073                    final String stringValue = valueToValidate.toString();
074                    try
075                    {
076                            final double doubleValue = Double.parseDouble(stringValue);
077                            return doubleValue >= min;
078                    }
079                    catch (final NumberFormatException e)
080                    {
081                            return false;
082                    }
083            }
084    
085            /**
086             * @param min the min to set
087             */
088            public void setMin(final double min)
089            {
090                    this.min = min;
091                    requireMessageVariablesRecreation();
092            }
093    
094            /**
095             * {@inheritDoc}
096             */
097            @Override
098            public Map<String, String> createMessageVariables()
099            {
100                    final Map<String, String> messageVariables = getCollectionFactory().createMap(2);
101                    messageVariables.put("min", Double.toString(min));
102                    return messageVariables;
103            }
104    }
